languages.text: "Твои братья и сестры служили и сгинули ради великой цели — служению навигаторскому Дому, а значит, и всему Империуму. Большая честь, вынести которую поистине смогли немногие".
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."
languages.original_text: "Твои братья и сестры служили и сгинули ради великой цели — служению навигаторскому Дому, а значит, и всему Империуму. Большая честь, вынести которую поистине смогли немногие".

traits.locale_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few indeed could bear."
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few indeed could bear."
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few indeed could bear."
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few indeed could bear."
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."
"Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

languages.text: "Eure Brüder und Schwestern haben für eine große Sache gelebt und sind dafür gestorben – im Dienste eines Navigatorenhauses und damit des gesamten Imperiums. Das ist eine große Ehre, der nur wenige nachzukommen wissen."
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Brüder und Schwestern haben für eine große Sache gelebt und sind dafür gestorben – im Dienste eines Navigatorenhauses und damit des gesamten Imperiums. Das ist eine große Ehre, der nur wenige nachzukommen wissen."

languages.text: « Vos frères et sœurs ont vécu et sont morts pour une grande cause : au service d'une maison de navigateurs et, par extension, de tout l'Imperium. C'est un immense honneur dont peu auraient su se montrer dignes. »
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: « Vos frères et sœurs ont vécu et sont morts pour une grande cause : au service d'une maison de navigateurs et, par extension, de tout l'Imperium. C'est un immense honneur dont peu auraient su se montrer dignes. »

languages.text: “你们的兄弟姐妹为了伟大的事业出生入死。他们为导航宗族服务，因此，也是在为整个帝国服务。如此崇高的荣誉，很少有人有机会承担。”
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: “你们的兄弟姐妹为了伟大的事业出生入死。他们为导航宗族服务，因此，也是在为整个帝国服务。如此崇高的荣誉，很少有人有机会承担。”

languages.text: 「あなたの兄弟姉妹たちは偉大な大義のために生き、そして死んでいきました…航宙士の家と、全帝国に仕えるという大義です。それは、滅多に負うことのない高尚な名誉なのです」
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの兄弟姉妹たちは偉大な大義のために生き、そして死んでいきましたーー航宙士の家と、全帝国に仕えるという大義です。それは、滅多に負うことのない高尚な名誉なのです」

languages.text: «Sus hermanos y hermanas vivieron y murieron por una noble causa: servir a la casa de navegantes y, por consiguiente, al Imperium. Es un gran honor. Uno que pocos son capaces de afrontar».
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: «Sus hermanos y hermanas vivieron y murieron por una noble causa: servir a la casa de navegantes y, por consiguiente, al Imperium. Es un gran honor. Uno que, de hecho, pocos son capaces de afrontar».

languages.text: "Kardeşlerin yüce bir amaç uğruna yaşadı ve öldü. Bir Rotacı Hanesi'ne ve dolayısıyla tüm İmparatorluk'a hizmet ettiler. Pek az kişinin nail olduğu bir şereftir bu."
languages.original_text: "Your brothers and sisters lived and died for a great cause — serving a Navigator House and therefore all of the Imperium. It is a high honour, one that few could bear."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerin yüce bir amaç uğruna yaşadı ve öldü. Bir Rotacı Hanesi'ne ve dolayısıyla tüm İmparatorluk'a hizmet ettiler. Pek az kişinin nail olduğu bir şereftir bu."
